activities.name: Eiffel Tower
activities.description: Visit the iconic tower and enjoy panoramic views of Paris.
activities.why_relevant: Symbol of Paris and a must-see attraction.

activities.name: Seine River Cruise
activities.description: Enjoy a relaxing cruise on the Seine River, passing by famous landmarks.
activities.why_relevant: A unique way to see Paris from the water.

daily_meal_suggestions.breakfast: Croissants and coffee at a local café.
daily_meal_suggestions.dinner: Dinner at a romantic bistro with traditional French cuisine.

details.daily_logistical_tips: Book Eiffel Tower tickets online to avoid queues.

activities.name: Louvre Museum
activities.description: Explore the world's largest art museum and historic monument.
activities.why_relevant: Home to many of the world's most famous artworks.

activities.name: Notre-Dame Cathedral
activities.description: Visit the iconic Gothic cathedral and climb its towers for a view of the city.
activities.why_relevant: An architectural masterpiece and symbol of Paris.
activities.estimated_cost: Free for entry; €10 for tower climb

activities.name: Montmartre Walking Tour
activities.description: Walk through the charming streets of Montmartre, visit Sacré-Cœur Basilica.
activities.why_relevant: Famous for its bohemian past and artistic history.

activities.name: Moulin Rouge
activities.description: Enjoy a spectacular cabaret show at the historic Moulin Rouge.
activities.why_relevant: Legendary venue known for its entertainment and history.

daily_meal_suggestions.lunch: Lunch at a café in Montmartre.

details.daily_logistical_tips: Reserve tickets for the Moulin Rouge show in advance.

activities.name: Champs-Élysées Shopping
activities.description: Stroll along the famous avenue and explore luxury shops and cafes.
activities.why_relevant: Known for shopping and iconic Parisian elegance.

activities.name: Luxembourg Gardens
activities.description: Relax in the beautiful gardens and enjoy the serene atmosphere.
activities.why_relevant: A peaceful retreat in the heart of Paris.

daily_meal_suggestions.breakfast: Breakfast at a café on Champs-Élysées.
daily_meal_suggestions.lunch: Lunch at a brasserie near the gardens.

details.daily_logistical_tips: Keep an eye on your belongings while shopping.

activities.name: Centre Pompidou
activities.description: Explore the modern art museum and architectural marvel.
activities.why_relevant: Known for its contemporary art collections and unique design.

activities.name: La Défense
activities.description: Visit the modern business district with impressive skyscrapers.
activities.why_relevant: Showcases the modern side of Paris.

details.daily_logistical_tips: Consider using public transport to reach La Défense.

activities.name: Palace of Versailles
activities.description: Explore the opulent palace and stunning gardens.
activities.why_relevant: A UNESCO World Heritage site and symbol of royal grandeur.

daily_meal_suggestions.lunch: Lunch at a café in Versailles.
daily_meal_suggestions.dinner: Return to Paris for dinner at a local restaurant.

details.daily_logistical_tips: Buy train tickets to Versailles in advance.

activities.name: Le Marais District
activities.description: Explore the historic district with chic boutiques and cafes.
activities.why_relevant: Known for its vibrant atmosphere and trendy culture.

activities.name: Sainte-Chapelle
activities.description: Visit the Gothic chapel known for its stunning stained glass windows.

daily_meal_suggestions.breakfast: Breakfast at a café in Le Marais.
daily_meal_suggestions.dinner: Farewell dinner at a classic Parisian bistro.

details.daily_logistical_tips: Check opening hours for Sainte-Chapelle before visiting.

estimated_cost: €1000 - €1500 for accommodation, activities, and local transport.
